basics.name: Mayank Tahilramani
basics.label: Cloud Networking Technology Specialist
basics.summary: This is Mayank's summary place holder.

work.summary: Cloud, Networking and DevOps subject matter expert within Americas Professional Services at Citrix. Dedicated to the acquisition, development, and dissemination of technical knowledge to customers and solution engineers to help overcome sales barriers and further the adoption of Citrix products. Responsible for developing subject matter expertise in Citrix products as well as complementary/competitive technologies within the industry. Involved in the development of best practices for new product releases, gathering product enhancement feedback and the development and delivery of technical training as well as serve as overall Citrix technology evangelist.
highlights: Directly impacted several million dollars in pipeline generation quarterly and helped close multi-million dollars in sales revenue yearly.

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
